General.Name: IDS France SAS
General.Description: IDS France SAS engages in the acquisition, production, and processing of value-added geographic information. The company is involved in the transformation of GIS data into deletion of objects, transformation of geometry, simplification of attributes, creation of level curves from elevation points, the reliability of network, as well as the structuring of data from one GIS model to another. It also provides data integration, verification, georeferencing, and the creation of new base plans; and integration of the data provided, the verification and reliability, the report as well as the dressing. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Lyon, France.
